name: Crappy Bird (GTFOmyNarnia)
description:
! IN DEVELOPMENT !

! NOT OPTIMIZED, PLAY IN FULL SCREEN ON 1080!

CONTROLS

     - Press 'Spacebar' to flap

     - Press 'Escape' to quit

DESCRIPTION

     Flappy Bird meets crap. Literally. Lay down torrential swathes of poop as you fly  through the level, avoiding various obstacles and eating various diarretic foods. 

This game is a few days old, so rest assured updates and more content will come, as well as bug fixes, depending on how well received this is.
